RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 53. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HEY MADALYN CLAIRE was coaxed forward to contest the pace inside rivals but racing off the rail, had the lead from the four-and-a-half, met challengers inside and out leaving the turn while drifting out a bit, retook command in upper stretch, drifted out through the lane but held well under steady handling. A P HUMOR moved outside the leading trio heading to the turn, advanced between runners four to five wide on that bend, made a mild bid coming to mid-stretch, was no match but second best. ROARING QUINN came in a bit at the start, rated in behind along the inside off the leaders, advanced into the turn, bid along the rail briefly coming to the top of the stretch but could not sustain the effort, saved show honors. DIATONIC vied between runners three wide for the lead, dropped back abruptly at the three-eighths pole, kept on in the stretch to come again and improve position between runners in late stretch. JUST A WIN broke in the air, settled at the rear, swung four wide for the stretch and ran on mildly. AGGIE DOCTOR broke awkwardly, made a rapid advance outside foes five to six wide on the turn, flattened out thereafter. BOSTON BELLE broke through the gate but was immediately restrained by the assistant secretary, attended the early pace from outside under some encouragement racing four wide into the turn, came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Roaring Quinn
ENTRY.COMMENT: came in brk, rated, inside advance, brief bid, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Just a Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in air, settled, swung 4w, mildly

ENTRY.NAME: A P Humor
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved out, 4-5w turn, bid mid-str, no match, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Aggie Doctor
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward brk, rapid 5-6w advance turn, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Madalyn Claire
ENTRY.COMMENT: coax forward, vied insd-2path, kept on, drifted out str, held

ENTRY.NAME: Diatonic
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3wd btw, dropped back 3/8, came again, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Boston Belle
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk thru gate, attended 4wide, empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 7 1/2F Turf CR: 93. Claiming Purse 19500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 3, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 3, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SNIVELING set a pressured pace inside, came out a bit leaving the far turn, was in command and clear in mid-stretch, lugged out late but held from PLAY MO, who settled in behind the leading pair stalking three to four wide, floated six wide into upper stretch, kept on grinding to narrow the gap on the winner but couldn't get there in time. CHARLIE G was forced out a bit heading into the first turn, settled toward the rear racing off the inside, fanned seven wide into upper stretch and was gaining late. REAL CITY SPEED reared at the start, steadied on heels and altered outside a foe heading into the first turn, settled at the back at that point, came out more turning for home but lacked room briefly in behind runners, found room between late and finished with interest. GET THEM JUSTIN prompted the pace from outside the eventual winner two to three wide, drifted out a bit coming to the top of the stretch, lacked the needed late kick and finished up evenly. JACI'S ROYALTY was rank early fighting rider's restraint, angled in entering the first turn, pulled nearer the leaders inside, moved out heading for the far turn racing two to three deep, lacked the needed late kick. NORTHERNREFLECTION raced mid-pack off the inside early, shifted in and saved ground on the far turn, failed to rally in the stretch. SILENT TAP was outside runners mostly four to five wide and not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Sniveling
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressured pace, inside, drift into str, lug out late, held

ENTRY.NAME: Real City Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: reared brk, stdy'd into 1st turn, in behind upper, room btw late

ENTRY.NAME: Get Them Justin
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced pace outside 2-3w, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Charlie G
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced out into 1st turn, fanned 7w, gaining

ENTRY.NAME: Jaci's Royalty
ENTRY.COMMENT: rank early, angled in, forwardly inside, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Northernreflection
ENTRY.COMMENT: shifted in, saved ground 2nd turn, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Silent Tap
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside 4-5w, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Play Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pair, stalked 3-4w, drift 6w, steady gain, missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 40. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MDA RUN ADDRESS bumped the inside rival at the start, settled off the leaders, moved four wide on the turn, lugged in a bit in upper stretch, took aim and surged past the leader late to win going away. MARINA was bumped at the break, moved forward from between rivals in an early move to take command coming to the half, set the tempo racing in the two path around the turn, was clear in mid-stretch and asked for more at that point but was outfinished while well clear of the rest. PENNIES FOR PAULLA settled off the leaders, saved ground inside on the turn, came out in the stretch, finished willingly to get up for third. AMELIES DREAMER exchanged a light bump at the start, pressed from outside three wide, steadily weakened from the turn and through the stretch, lost show honors late. ASEEL raced mid-pack off the inside travelling about two to three wide on the turn, angled five wide into upper stretch and ran on evenly. LA LOLA came in at the break, showed a very brief chase from inside but quickly dropped back, angled six wide into upper stretch and ran on. WITH GRACE lacked early speed, was forced five deep outside a rival through the turn coming seven wide into upper stretch, was never near enough to threaten. HALOS ALARM exchanged a light bump at the break, stalked the leading pair three wide into the turn, came up empty. HIT IT HARD angled in early and was encouraged along but lacking early speed, came out a bit running in the three to four path on the turn, failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: La Lola
ENTRY.COMMENT: came in brk, very brief chase inside, angled 6wd into str, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Pennies for Paulla
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, inside turn, came out str, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Aseel
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid-pack, angled 5wide into str, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Hit It Hard
ENTRY.OWNER: 5G Farms LLC and McBride Thoroughbreds LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in, no speed, 3-4path turn, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Marina
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk, forward btw, 2path, led 1/2, clear mid-str, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Mda Run Address
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump foe brk, settled, 4wd move turn, drove past late

ENTRY.NAME: Amelies Dreamer
ENTRY.COMMENT: light bump brk, pressed 3wide, weakened, lost show

ENTRY.NAME: Halos Alarm
ENTRY.COMMENT: light bump brk, stalked pair 3wide, empty

ENTRY.NAME: With Grace
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, 5wide turn, 7wide upper str, no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 3, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since March 3, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COOL INDIVIDUAL, unhurried at the rear racing inside, began to advance on the far turn, came out to pass a rival at the top of the stretch, struck the lead past mid-stretch inside the tiring leader and powered clear. ALIGNED INTEREST was outpaced early racing outside last but one three to four wide, swung five wide for the drive and kept on late to get up for second. CHARLI MICHAEL got away alertly, cleared the field and shifted in to the two path setting a lively pace chased by a foe but in the clear, began to edge away leaving the backstretch, drifted out in upper stretch while weakening and lost place late. J C'S IN TOWN bumped the outside rival at the start, settled well back of the leaders three to four wide, continued through the far turn removed from the inside two to three deep and ran on evenly late. BOULDERING was allowed to settle racing off the leaders saving some ground in the two path early, advanced along the rail on the far turn but lacked the needed late kick and evened out. DUKE OF BLUE RIDGE was bumped at the break, chased the pacesetter three to four deep, came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Cool Individual
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, inside, 2wd 3/16, led past mid-str, powered clear

ENTRY.NAME: Bouldering
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, inside advance 2nd turn, no late kick, evened out

ENTRY.NAME: Aligned Interest
ENTRY.COMMENT: outpaced early, 3-4w, swung 5w, up for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: J C's in Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump foe brk, 2-4w turns, evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: Duke of Blue Ridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped brk, chased 3-4w, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Charli Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: lively pace off rail, drift out upper str, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 16000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STARSNMOTION showed good early speed, dueled inside a runner on the turn, edged clear by upper stretch, held sway under steady urging. TROSKA settled off the pace racing in behind runners two to three deep through the turn, angled out six wide at the top of the stretch brushing a rival in the process, captured the place under stout urging but was only second best. ALL AMERICAN PAT began to advance some four wide on the turn after settling in behind and outside through the early stages, moved out six wide turning for home, was brushed lightly, ran on to secure show honors. TDZ CORRIENDA STAR was bumped a few strides after the start, raced off the pace inside, came out gradually through the latter part of the turn to be four deep past the quarter pole, lacked room in behind foes at the top of the stretch and was guided out eight wide at that juncture, finished with good energy but too late. PAYTON'S INDIAN was reluctant to load, bumped the outside rival at the start, had forward position stalking the leaders four to five wide, ran on evenly. RUN AWAY SAMARI broke a bit awkwardly then bumped a rival a couple strides later, moved forward to force the issue dueling outside two to three wide through the turn, steadily weakened. PERIPHERAL VISION was outpaced early, swung ten wide for the stretch run and improved position. DEE'S LIL FOOL was bumped at the start, outpaced in the early going, advanced outside foes seven wide on the turn, evened out for the drive. OCEAN FLEET broke just a bit awkwardly but recovered to be within range of the leaders three to four wide heading into the turn, came up empty. MALLORY UNBRIDLED was a bit reluctant to load, moved forward on the leading pair five to six wide on the turn, was within striking distancing turning for home but could not sustain the effort. PLEADING GUILTY chased from inside early, faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Starsnmotion
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside, dueled turn, clear 3/16, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Pleading Guilty
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Tdz Corrienda Star
ENTRY.OWNER: Doughtie Tony and Clear Creek Stud LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd after brk, inside, 4w 1/4, angled out 8w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Run Away Samari
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward brk & bump foe, duel 2-3w turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Peripheral Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: outpaced early, swung 10wide, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Troska
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, 2-3w, angled 6w 3/16 & brush, strong drive, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Ocean Fleet
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit awkward brk, in range 3-4w, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Payton's Indian
ENTRY.COMMENT: reluctant to load, bump foe brk, stalked 4-5w, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Dee's Lil Fool
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped brk, outpaced early, advanced 7wd turn, evened out

ENTRY.NAME: All American Pat
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-6w turn, brush upper, secured show

ENTRY.NAME: Mallory Unbridled
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit reluctant, advanced 6-5w turn, flattened out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE DECEMBER 3, 2022. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 3, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIAS MOONBEAM was caught five to six wide through the first turn, advanced in a middle move outside foes to challenge for the lead heading to the far turn, took command coming out of that bend and forged clear under steady urging. HELLUVA LIFE broke a step slowly, raced off the pace two to three wide into the first turn, was in tight on heels and altered outside a rival about the five-eighths, swung six wide for the drive and rallied but was only second best. SPHEROID was caught five wide early, moved forward in tandem with the eventual winner to content for the lead between rivals heading to the far turn, made a brief bid leaving that bend but had no extra for the drive. PAST VISIONS was encouraged forward while angling outside the leader heading into the first turn, pressed that one four wide then between runners three to four deep into the far turn, was outkicked. TAKEN BACK saved ground racing on or just off the rail and ran on with mild interest. DEALIN' STELEN settled off the pace racing about four wide through both turns, swung six deep for the drive and ran on evenly. BINDING saved ground inside mid-pack, dropped back and failed to respond. HONOR MY SPEED reared at the start and hit the gate, pulled keenly between rivals early up the backstretch, raced two to four wide, tired. EASY TO MISS moved clear under coaxing and shifted in to the three path to set the pace, soon faced outside pressure still racing off the fence, came up empty by the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Taken Back
ENTRY.OWNER: Landry Judy and Landry Robert J
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside-2wide, mildly

ENTRY.NAME: Binding
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back inside, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Honor My Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: reared brk & hit gate, pulled keenly 2-4w btw early, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Past Visions
ENTRY.COMMENT: switched out, pressed 4wide, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Helluva Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, 2-3w, tight & alter 5/8, swung 6w, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Dealin' Stelen
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4wide turns, swung 6w, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Easy to Miss
ENTRY.COMMENT: cleared & shifted in 3path, 2-3p turns, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Spheroid
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly 5wd & btw, bid, no extra

ENTRY.NAME: Mias Moonbeam
ENTRY.COMMENT: caught 5-6w, middle move, led, forged clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Darren J. Dworak, Renee Dworak & Angela Holthaus

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Turf CR: 95. Allowance Purse 31000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 3, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Cl aiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PAYNTER PARTY sped clear racing keenly in the early going to dictate terms off the fence, was encouraged in upper stretch and held sway while being kept to the task. COLOR FAST settled off the leader outside three to four wide, edged closer past rivals into upper stretch while moving out a bit and was second best. PAYNT BATTLE switched outside the leader and eventual winner, pursued that one three wide, had no extra for the drive but kept on well enough late to secure show honors. ONE TIME GEM bumped with the inner rival at the start, was caught two to three wide outside rivals into the first turn, shifted in at the half, saved ground on the far turn advancing on the leader but could only go evenly thereafter. MONARCH MAN exchanged a couple bumps at the start, saved ground inside mid-pack on the first turn, took closer order while moving off the inside heading up the backstretch, was within range two to three wide on the far turn but flattened out for the drive. MOTATAABEQ settled at the rear racing off the inside three to four deep on the turns, failed to menace. ONEFORVIVI bumped with inner and outer rivals at the start, shifted in, saved ground to no avail.

ENTRY.NAME: Paynt Battle
ENTRY.COMMENT: switched out, pursued winner 3wide, no extra

ENTRY.NAME: Paynter Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: sped clear, keen, pace off rail, held sway, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Monarch Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumps brk, inside early, switched out, 2-3w, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Oneforvivi
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumps brk, inside, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: One Time Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush brk, 2-3w early, shifted in, evenly str

ENTRY.NAME: Motataabeq
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled at rear, off inside, 3-4w turns, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Color Fast
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside 3-4wide, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LET'S GO RANDOM exchanged a light bump at the break, steadily advanced up the backstretch moving between foes at the half, steadied slightly near the quarter pole then altered out three deep, was within striking distance moving between foes turning for home, took over near the furlong grounds and forged clear under mild urging. EASY EDDIE A bumped with the inside foe at the start, settled off the pace, advanced steadily into the turn going four wide into that bend and moving out six deep by the end while making a brief and mild bid, was no match for the winner but second best. FLASHY BOY GOES set the pace inside with moderate outside pressure, appeared to brush the rail about the half-mile marker without much impact, moved clear turning into upper stretch, lacked the needed late kick. ASTERN BANKER lacked early speed settling at the back, advanced outside on the turn and ran on. CALL ME FIREY came in at the break, moved outside rivals four to five wide on the turn to reach striking distance but could not sustain the effort. MO HAWK MAN was urged at the break, chased inside on or just off the rail in behind the leaders, tired. NAUTICAL CRUISE pressed the early pace outside three wide then two to three deep through the turn, came up empty. RIDGEPOINT ROAD stalked from outside four wide early, dropped back and faded. SWEET LEVI was outpaced and not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Hawk Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged brk, chased in behind, inside-2wide, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Levi
ENTRY.COMMENT: outpaced, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Flashy Boy Goes
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace inside, brush rail 1/2, clear, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Let's Go Random
ENTRY.COMMENT: lite bmp brk, advanced btw 1/2, stdy 1/4, led mid-str, forge clr

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Eddie A
ENTRY.OWNER: Ardoin Farms LLC and Prejean Raymond
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump brk, advance 4-6w, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Call Me Firey
ENTRY.COMMENT: came in brk, moved 4-5w turn, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Nautical Cruise
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early 3wide, 2-3w turn, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Ridgepoint Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked outside, 3-4w, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Astern Banker
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside advance, ran on
